title: Synthesis of N-doped zeolite-templated carbons via depolymerized oligomer filling: applications in EDLC electrodes
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00400K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hiroyuki Itoi, Chika Matsuoka, Ginga Saeki, Hiroyuki Iwata, Shinichiroh Iwamura, Keigo Wakabayashi, Takeharu Yoshii, Hirotomo Nishihara, Yoshimi Ohzawa
Nitrogen-doped zeolite-templated carbons are synthesized from chitin and propylene as carbon and nitrogen sources and their EDLC performances are evaluated in an organic electrolyte.
